Mayor and City Council | City of Reno, TX



Mon-Fri 8:00AM – 5:00 PM.
Closed for lunch 11:00AM – 12:00 PM.

Mayor and City Council
======================

The City Council usually meets the 3rd Monday of each month at 7:00 p.m.

City Hall
195 W. Reno Road,
Azle, Texas 76020-6001

The governing body, known as the City Council, consists of a Mayor and five Council Member’s, who are elected by places.

![](https://www.renotx.gov/wp-content/uploads/2019/04/IMG_1985-scaled.jpeg)
Hector
Bas
Mayor
